Articles.Content:
I am very excited to announce that my first ever Duna expedition is underway! In true Kerbal fashion, it's being undertaken by a first-time, very unfinished and yet-untested craft that wobbles a bunch. But I'm doing it nonetheless!

I'll post a slew of pictures with my next post, but I am quite happy to see my little space agency moving up in the world(s)!

Please wish me luck, and pictures and an awesome story are sure to follow!
Good luck! I look forward to seeing your wobbly, untested ship
